title: Introducing the VivoBook E403
description:
ASUS VivoBook E403 boasts sleek, streamlined curves and an understated premium feel. This 14-inch laptop is just 17.9mm-thin and tips the scales at a lightweight 3.5lbs ; and has a brushed aluminium cover finished in glacier gray. With up to 9 hours of battery life, VivoBook E403 lets you stay productive throughout the day, and to make things easier, there's even a reversible USB Type-C™ port.

For more information head over to:
United States: http://www.asus.com/us/
Canada: https://www.asus.com/ca-en/ 

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/asusrog
